trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Kalamazoo
There were no other sightings in Kalamazoo on or around September 25th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsI have been experiencing UFO sightings since i've moved to this area. I was on my balcony looking southeast when i noticed the light which was pulsating multiple colors. I began filming and it seemed to morph, possibly emit other objects and change its path. It went from one light to multiple lights, up to four at once. I have seen things like this before but this time I was a bit fearful. After filming it for a couple minutes it vanished.
Summary: Slow moving, multiple pulsating lights, appeared & re-appeared then eventually vanished
